sentences: Jacqueline Richard (March 8, 1928 - August 2, 2015) was a Québécois Canadian pianist and conductor who is perhaps best known for resigning from the Order of Canada in 2009.
Jacqueline Richard was born March 8, 1928 in Montreal.
She presented 75 performances, in two years, of various operatic works including L'Oca del Cairo by Mozart.
Jacqueline Richard was awarded the Quebec Lieutenant-Governor's medal in 1953.
